SEARCH
Module org.klojang.jdbc
Package org.klojang.jdbc

Interface Transformer<T>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of the bean being saved to the database
public interface Transformer<T>
Transformers enable you to modify values before they are saved to the database. Transformers can be configured for bean properties while preparing a batch INSERT using an SQLBatchInsertBuilder.
See Also:
  • SQLBatchInsertBuilder.withTransformer(String, Transformer)
  • SQL.expression(String)
  • Quoter

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Object
    transform(T bean, Object value, Quoter quoter)
    Transforms and returns the specified value.

  • Method Details

    • transform

      Object transform(T bean, Object value, Quoter quoter) throws Throwable
      Transforms and returns the specified value.
      Parameters:
      bean - the bean containing the value
      value - the value to be transformed
      quoter - a Quoter instance that you can use if you intend to construct and return a SQLExpression. If you return anything else, don't use the quoter. Escaping and quoting will be taken care of by Klojang JDBC or simply by JDBC itself. Only use the Quoter to escape and quote strings within an SQL expression.
      Returns:
      the value to be saved to the database
      Throws:
      Throwable - if an error occurs while transforming the value
